tp.pr2.logic

Class SimpleCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr2.logic.Cell
      • tp.pr2.logic.SimpleCell

  • public class SimpleCell
extends Cell

    SimpleCell class.

    Reproduce after some life cycle steps. Might die if they don't move enough.

        Executes a move

        Cells execute a step in their life cycle

        They might die, move, reproduce, burst, eat, idle, ...

        coords - Origin coordinates
        surface - Surface instance
